name: X-Men Origins: Wolverine (DS)
description: DARE TO PLAY AS WOLVERINE in this action-adventure combat game inspired by the new movie, X-Men Origins Wolverine, only in theaters Forge your way through 7 thrilling levels of traps to take on an army of foes. Fight soldiers specialized in baton, assault and marksmanship using your signature moves such as the Claw Thrust and Cross Hack. Collect power-ups to enhance your strength as you battle against archenemies.
